message.content: cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.CV. The paper is about information retrieval and machine learning for ranking, which are core topics in the subfield of Information Retrieval (cs.IR). The use of a linear classifier and logistic regression also suggests a connection to the subfield of Machine Learning (cs.LG). The paper also mentions standard IR ranking measures, which are commonly used in Natural Language Processing (cs.CL) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the use of logistic regression for ranking is also relevant to Computer Vision (cs.CV), where it is commonly used for image classification and object detection.
